name: OKB
description: OKB is the utility token of the OKX ecosystem, and holders of OKB will enjoy a series of privileges on the OKX platform. On May 4, 2019, we initiated the OKB Burn program. OKB has a total supply of 300 million. As of September 11, 2023, 70,182,835.48 OKB has already been burnt. The distinguished OKB holders will enjoy many privileges including trading fee discounts, OKX Jumpstart, OKB savings, and more. We will always be dedicated to providing first-class services to OKB holders, and expanding the use cases of OKB all over the globe.
